As an AI language model, I don't have access to Mauser's specific initiatives to promote sustainability amongst its employees and customers, but many companies have implemented several eco-friendly initiatives that promote sustainability among their employees and customers such as:

1. Employee awareness programs: Mauser can educate its staff on sustainable living practices such as using eco-friendly products, recycling, and energy conservation. This involves conducting training and workshops on how to follow eco-friendly practices.

2. Encourage employees to volunteer: Mauser can encourage its employees to volunteer for community-based sustainability programs or participate in environmental clean-up initiatives.

3. Eco-friendly incentives for employees: Mauser can reward employees who follow eco-friendly initiatives or those who create and implement eco-friendly practices.

4. Packaging and waste reduction: Mauser could promote eco-friendly behaviour among customers by encouraging the reduction of waste, use of reusable packaging, and encouraging the use of recycled materials.

5. Partner with customers: Mauser can partner with its customers in eco-friendly initiatives such as providing resources to customers to recycle, promoting the use of eco-friendly packaging materials or organizing environmental campaigns.

6. Develop customer awareness programs: Mauser could craft marketing campaigns that educate customers about the importance of environmentally friendly practices, how to adopt them, and why they are necessary.

7. Reward eco-friendly behaviour by customers: Mauser can incentivize customers who adopt eco-friendly practices with coupons or discounts, by organizing eco-challenges with prizes such as an eco-vacation or other similar initiatives. 

By engaging with employees and customers on sustainability initiatives, Mauser can build greater awareness around eco-friendly practices, increase participation in such programs and build up greater demand for their eco-friendly products.
